title: About the Global Climate Dashboard
content:
If Earth's climate were a car, then this app is would be its dashboard: a place where you can quickly take stock of all its major systems. You can sort by themes to see indicators for either climate change, including sea level and mountain glaciers, or natural variability, including El Niño and the Arctic Oscillation. Click on a thumbnail to access each indicator's full landing page.
The Global Climate Dashboard provides a wide view of the state of Earth's climate, including natural patterns and indicators of climate change.
